synopsis.text: Miku Hatsune, the virtual idol, teams up with Love Live! Sunshine!! in an exhilarating music video for the song "BANZAI! digital trippers" by Aqours. This captivating collaboration is part of the BANZAI! digital trippers single Blu-ray/DVD set. While the trailer offers a tantalizing glimpse, the full animation is available with the Blu-ray/DVD set, promising an immersive experience that blends music and animation in a unique spectacle.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
